QuestData.Title: Captain Dreadbeard
QuestData.Description: This is getting pretty fun, but let's not forget we're here for Gnomeregan!$B$BWe spotted the captain of the Southsea over on one of his boats to the south, past where all the fighting is. He's all alone on his little boat, undefended!$B$BIf you go take care of him, we'll have the rest of these pirates mopped up in no time.
QuestData.RewardText: He was controlling a sea giant? Fascinating. If we'd managed to investigate further...$B$BOh, I mean, wow, that's totally crazy! But thank goodness he's gone, hooray! Mister Noggenfogger will be so pleased.$B$BHere's a nice big reward, you!
